#Text=5. Mathematical Model
#Text=According to the above description and assumption of the problem , the mathematical model for a CLSCN considering sustainability will be presented in detail .
#Text=These formulations are developed by extending previous works ( mainly ) .
#Text=5.1 .
#Text=Notations
#Text=Sets and Indices
#Text=Set of candidate plants , .
#Text=Set of candidate distribution centers , .
#Text=Set of candidate collection center , .
#Text=Set of candidate remanufacturing center , .
#Text=Set of fixed customers , .
#Text=Parameters
#Text=Demand of customer m .
#Text=Return rate of used products from customer m .
#Text=Remanufacturing rate of used products at remanufacturing centers .
#Text=Carbon cap of supply chain set by the government .
#Text=Cost of producing one unit product at plant i .
#Text=Cost of distributing one unit product at distribution center j .
#Text=Cost of collecting one unit product at collection center k .
#Text=Cost of remanufacturing one unit product at remanufacturing center l .
#Text=Cost of transporting one unit of new product per mile by transport vehicle type A.
#Text=Cost of transporting one unit of used product per mile by transport vehicle type A.
#Text=Cost of transporting one unit of new product per mile by transport vehicle type B.
#Text=Cost of transporting one unit of used product per mile by transport vehicle type B.
#Text=Distance between plant i and distribution center j .
#Text=Distance between distribution center j and customer m .
#Text=Distance between customer m and collection center k .
#Text=Distance between collection center k and remanufacturing center l .
#Text=Distance between remanufacturing center l and distribution center j .
#Text=Fixed cost of establishing plant i .
#Text=Cost of establishing distribution center j .
#Text=Fixed cost of establishing collection center k .
#Text=Fixed cost of establishing remanufacturing center l .
#Text=Minimum capacity for plant i .
#Text=Maximum capacity for plant i .
#Text=Minimum capacity for distribution center j .
#Text=Maximum capacity for distribution center j .
#Text=Minimum capacity for collection center k .
#Text=Maximum capacity for collection center k .
#Text=Minimum capacity for remanufacturing center l .
#Text=Maximum capacity for remanufacturing center l .
#Text=Carbon emission for producing one unit of product at plant i .
#Text=Carbon emission for distributing one unit of product at distribution center j .
#Text=Carbon emission for collecting one unit of product at collection center k .
#Text=Carbon emission for remanufacturing one unit of product at remanufacturing center l .
#Text=Carbon emission for transporting one unit of new product per mile by transport vehicle type A.
#Text=Carbon emission for transporting one unit of used product per mile by transport vehicle type A.
#Text=Carbon emission for transporting one unit of new product per mile by transport vehicle type B.
#Text=Carbon emission for transporting one unit of used product per mile by transport vehicle type B.
#Text=Numbers of missed working days due to work ’s damages during establishing plant i .
#Text=Maximum averages of missed days due to work ’s damages when establishing plant i .
#Text=Numbers of missed working days due to work ’s damages when establishing distribution center j .
#Text=Maximum averages of missed days due to work ’s damages when establishing distribution center j .
#Text=Numbers of missed working days due to work ’s damages when establishing collection center k .
#Text=Maximum averages of missed days due to work ’s damages when establishing collection center k .
#Text=Numbers of missed working days due to work ’s damages when establishing remanufacturing center l .
#Text=Maximum averages of missed days due to work ’s damages when establishing remanufacturing center l .
#Text=Decision Variables
#Text=A binary variable , it is 1 : if plant i is established ; otherwise , 0 .
#Text=A binary variable , it is 1 : if distribution center j is established ; otherwise , 0 .
#Text=A binary variable , it is 1 : if collection center k is established ; otherwise , 0 .
#Text=A binary variable , it is 1 : if remanufacturing center l is established ; otherwise , 0 .
#Text=Volume of products shipped from plant i to distribution center j .
#Text=Volume of products shipped from distribution center j to customer m .
#Text=Volume of used products shipped from customer m and collection center k.
#Text=Volume of used products shipped from collection center k and remanufacturing center l .
#Text=Volume of products shipped from remanufacturing center l and distribution center j .
#Text=Membership degree for the number of missed working days due to work ’s damages for each worker during establishing plants .
#Text=Membership degree for the number of missed working days due to work ’s damages for each worker during establishing distribution centers .
#Text=Membership degree for the number of missed working days due to work ’s damages for each worker during establishing collection centers .
#Text=Membership degree for the number of missed working days due to work ’s damages for each worker during establishing remanufacturing centers .
#Text=5.2 .
#Text=Objective Functions
#Text=We use the notations described in the previous subsection to develop the objectives step-by-step as follows :
